meanings.definition: A person or thing that secretes.
meanings.sent1: The secreter of the group always had surprises up their sleeve.
meanings.sent2: The gland was a secreter of essential hormones for the body.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel was the secreter of acorns, hiding them all over the yard.
meanings.sent4: The old tree was a secreter of wisdom, its branches whispering ancient tales.
meanings.sent5: The secreter of joy, the sun peeked through the clouds, brightening the day.

meanings.definition: One that secretes, as a gland.
meanings.sent1: The secreter in the body helps maintain balance and health.
meanings.sent2: The gland, a natural secreter, releases enzymes for digestion.
meanings.sent3: The flower was a secreter of sweet nectar, attracting bees with its fragrance.
meanings.sent4: The mountain was a secreter of minerals, its depths holding precious treasures.
meanings.sent5: The secreter of life, the seed sprouted into a beautiful flower.
